mil3.7.16:1.2: “bhante nāgasena, dukkaraṃ nu kho bhagavatā katan”ti?
mil3.7.16:1.5: “Kiṃ pana, bhante nāgasena, bhagavatā dukkaraṃ katan”ti.
mil3.7.16:1.6: “Dukkaraṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā kataṃ imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe vattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ akkhātaṃ ‘ayaṃ phasso, ayaṃ vedanā, ayaṃ saññā, ayaṃ cetanā, idaṃ cittan’”ti.
mil3.7.16:2.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso nāvāya mahāsamuddaṃ ajjhogāhetvā hatthapuṭena udakaṃ gahetvā jivhāya sāyitvā jāneyya nu kho, mahārāja, so puriso ‘idaṃ gaṅgāya udakaṃ, idaṃ yamunāya udakaṃ, idaṃ aciravatiyā udakaṃ, idaṃ sarabhuyā udakaṃ, idaṃ mahiyā udakan’”ti?
mil3.7.16:2.4: “Ito dukkarataraṃ kho, mahārāja, bhagavatā kataṃ imesaṃ arūpīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekārammaṇe vattamānānaṃ vavatthānaṃ akkhātaṃ ‘ayaṃ phasso, ayaṃ vedanā, ayaṃ saññā, ayaṃ cetanā, idaṃ cittan’”ti.
